rules_text:
{W}: Put a level counter on Hopeful Recruit.
Hopeful Recruit gets +1/+0 and has first strike as long as it has a level counter on it.
Hopeful Recruit also gets +3/+3 and has lifelink as long as it has four or more level counters on it.
Hopeful Recruit also gets +4/+4 and has indestructible as long as it has eight or more level counters on it.
